description.en: Learn that 'when' talking about the future is ALWAYS followed by present simple, never future tense. 'Will' goes in the other clause.
description.es: Aprende que 'when' hablando del futuro SIEMPRE va seguido de presente simple, nunca futuro. 'Will' va en la otra cláusula.
